respStmt.resp: Conversion from IMP to ELTeC encoding.
respStmt.name: Tomaž Erjavec

respStmt.resp: Izbira romanov in dodajanje metapodatkov ELTeC.
respStmt.name: Marko Juvan
Miran Hladnik
Katja Mihurko Poniž

publicationStmt.publisher: COST Action "Distant Reading for European Literary History" (CA16204)

bibl.title: Tavčar, Ivan. Cvetje v jeseni : edicija IMP

encodingDesc.p: This edition for ELTeC was automatically down-converted from the IMP digital library edition, and several pieces of ELTeC-specific metadata were added. Tokenisation and sentence segmentation performed with ReLDI tokeniser, word modernisation with CSMTiser, and UD morphosyntactic tagging and lemmatisation with CLASSLA-StanfordNLP trained for Slovene. Named entities were annotated with Janes-NER, which uses the set of NE labels detailed in the Annotation guidelines for Slovenian named entities Janes-NER V1.1.

revisionDesc.change: Tomaž Erjavec: Annotation with Nikola's tool-chain & TEI editing.
